              org.agilewiki.jactor.factory.ActorFactory actorFactory)

        Process the requirements and assign the parent actor. Once assigned, it can not be changed.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class org.agilewiki.jactor.lpc.JLPCActor
        Parameters:
